description:
Crona’s basking in the love offered so freely by the other students at DWMA. But when Medusa appears and orders Crona to do her bidding, the chill of old fear might overpower the warmth of new friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arida felicità. Di chi sono le lacrime che brillano al chiaro di luna?
Bonheur tari. À qui sont ces larmes qui brillent au clair de lune ?
Drying Happiness! Whose Tears Sparkle in the Moonlight?
Kareru Koufuku: Tsukiakari ni Hikaru no wa Dare no Namida?
涸れた幸福 ~月明かりに光るのは誰の涙?~
